name.description: The name of the package.

asset_id.description: The ID of the uploaded asset.
asset_id.example: Expedita aut quia nam nulla rerum blanditiis.

name.description: The name to give the document as it will be displayed in UIs.

slug.description: The slug to give the document as it will be displayed in URLs.

name.description: The name of the package to add.
name.example: Id accusamus eligendi rerum aut quasi delectus.

version.description: The version of the package to add. If omitted, the latest version will be used.

content_length.description: The content length of the asset

content_type.description: The content type of the asset
content_type.example: Pariatur accusamus tempore qui est rerum error.

created_at.description: The creation date of the asset.

id.description: The ID of the asset
id.example: Aliquam veniam ut quaerat reiciendis exercitationem eius.

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the asset

updated_at.description: The last update date of the asset.

example.content_type: Consequuntur officiis sed ratione sit quis qui.
example.sha256: Aut minus sapiente ea et nihil enim.
